meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amanda Boitano Patricia Kelvin John Schultz Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6984.

td.p: Amanda Boitano, a 10th grade English teacher originally from Smithtown, New York
Patricia Kelvin, an editor of a monthly newspaper from Poland, Ohio
John Schultz, a computer programmer from Ann Arbor, Michigan (whose 5-day cash winnings total $104,500)

tr.td: GONNA FLY NOW
HERALDRY
DOUBLE "O"
HOMER
THE ILL-IAD

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'An April 2014 press release reported this airline "says ni hao! to Beijing", starting nonstop service; Beijing should say mahalo')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: An April 2014 press release reported this airline "says ni hao! to Beijing", starting nonstop service; Beijing should say mahalo

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'In heraldry, a cross surrounded by 4 small crosses is known as the crusaders\' cross or the cross of this city')

Patricia
Amanda

EXISTENTIALISM

WORDS OF FORGIVENESS
